mapper.select: select student.stuUUID, student.stuName, student.email, level.levelName, level.salary, level.coefficient, stu_position.subsidyTotal, IFNULL(stipulation_record.moneyTotal, 0) moneyTotal, IFNULL(stipulation_record.valueTotal, 0) valueTotal, performance.score from (select stuUUID, stuName, email, levelID from tb_student where classUUID = #{classUUID} and status = 1) student left join tb_level level on student.levelID = level.levelID left join (select SUM(tp.postSubsidy) subsidyTotal, tsp.stuUUID from tb_stu_position tsp inner join tb_position tp on tsp.postID = tp.postID) stu_position on stu_position.stuUUID = student.stuUUID left join (select tsr.stuUUID, SUM(ts.sMoney) moneyTotal, SUM(ts.`sValue`) valueTotal from tb_stipulation_record tsr inner join tb_stipulation ts on tsr.sID = ts.sID where PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(now(), '%Y%m' ) , date_format(tsr.createTime, '%Y%m' )) =1) stipulation_record on stipulation_record.stuUUID = student.stuUUID left join (select stuUUID, createTime, score from tb_performance where PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(now(), '%Y%m' ) , date_format(createTime, '%Y%m' )) =1) performance on performance.stuUUID = student.stuUUID

select student.stuName, IFNULL(performance.score, -1) score from (select stuUUID, stuName from tb_student where classUUID = #{classUUID} and status = 1) student left join (select stuUUID, score from tb_performance where PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(now(), '%Y%m' ) , date_format(createTime, '%Y%m' )) =1) performance on performance.stuUUID = student.stuUUID
